short_summary: Rehabilitation of pavement and wildlife underpass BNP 2023
description: Highway road maintenance; asphalt resurfacing and structural repairs on Whitehorn and Lake Louise Drive (Lake Louise, AB). Design-build of a precast concrete box culvert wildlife underpass near Lake Louise Ski Area on Whitehorn Drive.
duration_in_months: Our analysis says it is likely to be approximately 5 months
full_summary:
### Stage 2 - Whitehorn Drive Pavement Rehabilitation and Wildlife Underpass 2023

#### Issued by:
Parks Canada

#### Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0048/A

#### Summary:
This is Stage 2 of a two-stage solicitation process for the requirement of a pavement rehabilitation project on Whitehorn Drive in Banff National Park. The project involves asphalt resurfacing and structural repairs on Whitehorn and Lake Louise Drive, as well as the design-build of a Precast Concrete Box Culvert wildlife underpass near the Lake Louise Ski Area.

#### Scope of Work:
The project includes:

* Asphalt resurfacing and line painting
* Signage replacement
* Roadway structure repairs
* Drainage improvements
* Design-build of a Precast Concrete Box Culvert wildlife underpass

#### Budget and Timeline:
The expected contract start date is June 6, 2023, and the expected contract end date is October 13, 2023.

#### Tendering Process:
This is a request for proposals with a two-stage selection process. Interested suppliers were previously evaluated for their qualifications. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to submit a financial bid on the project.

#### Contact Information:
To obtain the tender documents or to submit a bid, please contact:

* Kenneth Lacanilao
* kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca
* (587) 832-1894

#### Standing Trade Agreements:
This solicitation is subject to the following standing trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

#### Eligible Proponents:
Proponents are required to be Canadian and have a valid Goods and Services Tax (GST) number.

#### Basis of Selection:
The selection will be based on the lowest price for the works described in the tender. 

#### Important Dates:

* Tender closing date: May 30, 2023, at 16:00 MST
* Expected contract start date: June 6, 2023
* Expected contract end date: October 13, 2023
